page.title: 05Beckenham Convent
page.content: Beckenham convent was started in 1927.It is a private Catholic boarding school for two hundred girls between the ages of 11 and 18.At present there are 47 boarders.Many come from overseas to improve their English.It has two main buildings and two smaller ones.It is situated inside its own grounds and has netball and tennis courts. Ther is also a chapel which is dedicated to Our Lady of the Rosary. The girls are taught all the usual secondary school subjects and are able to join clubs such as Art,French,Music and Spanish.they enjoy sports like hockey,rounders and table tennis.
